TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MsmqBindingBase extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences
Public MustInherit Class MsmqBindingBase Inherits Binding Implements IBindingRuntimePreferences
public ref class MsmqBindingBase abstract : System::ServiceModel::Channels::Binding, System::ServiceModel::Channels::IBindingRuntimePreferences

span.span: The base class for and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此抽象类包含 和 通用的属性。This abstract class contains properties common to and . 队列的所有基本概念都以属性形式显示。All of the fundamental concepts in queuing are displayed in the form of properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ CustomDeadLetterQueue { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 URI，该 URI 包含每个应用程序的死信队列（该队列用于放置已过期的消息以及传输或传递失败的消息）的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a URI that contains the location of the dead-letter queue for each application, where messages that have expired or that have failed transfer or delivery are placed.

value.span: ，其中包含每个应用程序的死信队列的位置。

span.span: The that contains the location of the dead-letter queue for each application.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 死信队列是发送应用程序的队列管理器中的一个队列，用于放置传递失败的过期消息。The dead-letter queue is a queue on the queue manager of the sending application for expired messages that failed to be delivered. 指定的 URI 必须使用 net.msmq 方案。The URI that is specified by must use the net.msmq scheme. 如果 设置为 或 ，则 必须设置为 `null`。If is set to or , then must be set to `null`. 如果 不为 `null`，则 必须设置为 。If is not `null`, then must be set to .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::DeadLetterQueue DeadLetterQueue { System::ServiceModel::DeadLetterQueue get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::DeadLetterQueue value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个枚举值，该值指示要使用的死信队列的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets an enumeration value that indicates the type of dead-letter queue to use.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，指示要使用的死信队列的类型。

span.span: A enumeration value that indicates the type of dead-letter queue to use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 死信队列是发送应用程序的队列管理器中的一个队列，用于放置传递失败的过期消息。The dead-letter queue is a queue on the queue manager of the sending application for expired messages that have failed to be delivered. 死信队列枚举指定要使用的死信队列的类型。The dead-letter queue enumeration specifies the type of dead-letter queue to use. 该属性的值有：The values are: - `None`：不需要死信队列。`None`: No dead-letter queue is required. 如果消息传递失败，则不会在死信队列中保留该消息的任何记录。If a message fails delivery, no record of it is maintained in the dead-letter queue. 这是当 设置为 `false` 时的默认值。This is the default value when is set to `false`. - `System`：系统级死信队列用于记录传递失败的消息。`System`: The system-wide dead-letter queue is used to record messages that fail delivery. 消息队列 (MSMQ) 具有一个事务性系统死信队列和一个非事务性系统死信队列，分别记录来自事务性队列和非事务性队列的传递失败的消息。Message Queuing (MSMQ) has a transactional, system, dead-letter queue and a non-transactional, system, dead-letter queue to record messages that fail delivery from transactional and non-transactional queues, respectively. 这是当 设置为 `true` 时的默认值。This is the default value when is set to `true`. - `Custom`： 属性中指定的用于记录传递失败消息的队列。`Custom`: The queue specified in the property that is used to record messages that fail delivery. 造成消息未能到达接收应用程序的原因包括：The reasons a message can fail to reach the receiving application include: - 事务性消息被发送到非事务性队列中。A transactional message is sent to a non-transactional queue. - 非事务性消息被发送到事务性队列中。A non-transactional message is sent to a transactional queue. - 未经身份验证的消息被发送到仅接受经过身份验证的消息的队列中。An unauthenticated message is sent to a queue that accepts only authenticated messages. - 未加密的消息被发送到仅接受加密消息的队列中。An unencrypted message is sent to a queue that accepts only encrypted messages. - 消息在传递给接收方之前过期。The message expires before the message is delivered to a receiver. - 超出了目标计算机的消息存储配额或目标队列的存储配额，或者在消息到达时目标计算机上没有可用的存储空间。The message storage quota of the target computer or the storage quota of the destination queue is exceeded, or there is no available storage space on the target computer when the message arrives. - 发件人没有[访问权限](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=96167)所需的消息放入目标队列。The sender does not have the [access rights](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=96167) required to place the message in the destination queue. - 附加在消息上的数字签名无效。The digital signature attached to the message is not valid. - 加密的消息不能由目标队列管理器解密。An encrypted message cannot be decrypted by the destination queue manager. - 目标队列在检索消息之前被清除或删除。The destination queue is purged or deleted before the message is retrieved.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Durable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定此绑定处理的消息是持久的还是可变的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the messages processed by this binding are durable or volatile.

value.span: 如果此绑定处理的消息是持久的，则为 ；如果这些消息是可变的，则为 。

span.span: if the messages processed by this binding are durable; if they are volatile.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 持久性消息能够在队列管理器停止响应时保留下来，而可变消息则不能。A durable message survives when a queue manager stops responding, while a volatile message does not. 当应用程序可以容忍偶尔丢失消息时，可变消息是有用的。Volatile messages are useful when applications can tolerate occasional lost messages. 如果 设置为 `true`，则消息必须为持久的。If is set to `true`, the messages must be durable.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExactlyOnce { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否只接收一次由此绑定处理的消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether messages processed by this binding are received exactly once.

value.span: 如果只接收一次由此绑定处理的消息，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if messages processed by this binding are received exactly once; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 发送的消息可以包含保证，也可以不包含保证。A message can be sent with or without assurances. 应用程序可以使用保证来确保发送的消息到达接收消息队列；如果消息未能到达，则应用程序可以通过读取死信队列进行确定。An assurance enables an application to ensure that a sent message reached the receiving message queue, or if it did not, the application can determine this by reading the dead-letter queue. 将 设置为 `true` 时发送的消息必须只发送到事务性队列。Messages sent with set to `true` must be sent to a transactional queue only. 当 设置为 `true` 时，指示消息队列 (MSMQ) 应确保将发送的消息传递到接收消息队列一次且只有一次。, when set to `true`, indicates that Message Queuing (MSMQ) ensures that a sent message is delivered to the receiving message queue once and only once. 如果传递失败，则会将消息发送到死信队列。If delivery fails, the message is sent to the dead-letter queue. 对于要求将 设置为 `false` 的消息， 属性默认为 `null`。For messages that require to be `false`, the property defaults to `null`. 对于要求将 设置为 `true` 的消息， 属性默认为 MSMQ 中的事务性系统级死信队列。For messages that require to be `true`, the property defaults to a transactional system-wide dead-letter queue in MSMQ.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaxReceivedMessageSize { long get(); void set(long value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此绑定可处理消息的最大字节大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, for a message that is processed by this binding.

value.span: 此绑定可处理的最大消息大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The maximum size (in bytes) for a message that is processed by this binding.

value.span: 默认值为 65,536 字节。

span.span: The default value is 65,536 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对消息大小进行的此限制旨在降低遭受拒绝服务 (DoS) 攻击的可能性。This bound on message size is intended to limit exposure to Denial of Service (DoS) attacks.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxRetryCycles { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置尝试向接收应用程序传递消息的最大重试周期数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of retry cycles to attempt delivery of messages to the receiving application.

value.span: 尝试向应用程序传递消息的最大重试周期数。

span.span: The maximum number of retry cycles to attempt delivery of messages to the application.

value.span: 默认值为 2。

span.span: The default value is 2.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单个重试周期按指定次数尝试向应用程序传递消息。A single retry cycle attempts to deliver a message to an application a specified number of times. 尝试次数由 属性设置。The number of attempts made is set by the property. 如果在连续重试了指定次数后，应用程序仍未能访问消息，则将消息发送到重试队列。If the application fails to access the message after the specified number of immediate retries, the message is sent to a retry queue. 后续的重试周期包括在经过由 属性指定的延迟后，从重试队列返回应用程序队列以再次尝试传递给接收应用程序的消息。Subsequent retry cycles consist of the message being returned from the retry queue to the application queue to attempt delivery to the application again, after a delay specified by the property. 属性指定应用程序用于尝试传递消息的重试周期数。The property specifies the number of retry cycles that the application uses to attempt to deliver the message.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ReceiveContextEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示是否请求接收上下文行为的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the receive context behavior is requested.

value.span: 如果要求接收上下文行为，则为 ；否则为。

span.span: if the receive context behavior is requested; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::ReceiveErrorHandling ReceiveErrorHandling { System::ServiceModel::ReceiveErrorHandling get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::ReceiveErrorHandling value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个枚举值，该值指定如何处理病毒消息。

span.span: Gets or sets an enumeration value that specifies how poison messages are handled.

value.span: 一个 值，指定如何处理病毒消息和其他无法调度的消息。

span.span: A value that specifies how poison and other messages that cannot be dispatched are handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果多次尝试传递队列中的某个消息都失败，则说明该消息已中毒。A message in the queue becomes poisoned if repeated attempts to deliver the message failed. 此病毒消息将最终根据此属性的设置来处理。This poison message is eventually handled based on the setting of this property. 当此属性设置为 时，侦听器会出错，并且会跟踪和引发一个 。When this property is set to , the listener is faulted and a is traced and thrown. 病毒消息会留在队列中，您必须先将其移除，才能访问队列中的其他消息。The poison message is left in the queue and must be removed before more messages can be accessed from the queue. 包含一个 ，它可用于标识病毒消息并将其从队列中手动移除。The contains a that can be used to identify and manually remove the poison message from the queue. 当此属性设置为 时，就会丢弃病毒消息。When this property is set to , the poison message is dropped. 当此属性设置为 时，会将一个否定确认发送到客户端，并从队列中移除病毒消息。When this property is set to , a negative acknowledgement is sent to the client and the poison message is removed from the queue. 此选项仅在消息队列 4.0 中可用，且需要 [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)]。This option is available only on Message Queuing 4.0 and requires [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)]. 当设置为 时，会将病毒消息移动到最后一个病毒子队列。When set to , the poison message is moved to the final poison subqueue. 此选项仅在“消息队列 4.0”中可用，且需要 [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)]。This option is only available on Message Queuing 4.0 and requires [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ReceiveRetryCount { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置从应用程序队列读取的消息的最大立即传递尝试次数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of immediate delivery attempts on a message that is read from the application queue.

value.span: 立即传递尝试的最大次数。

span.span: The maximum number of immediate delivery attempts.

value.span: 默认值为 5。

span.span: The default is 5.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果达到消息的最大立即传递尝试次数且应用程序仍未访问消息，则会将消息发送到重试队列，以便在以后尝试传递。If the maximum number of immediate delivery attempts for the message is made and the message is not accessed by the application, then the message is sent to a retry queue to attempt delivery at a later time. 如果未指定重试周期，则将消息发送到病毒消息队列，或将否定确认发送回发送方。If no retry cycles are specified, then the messages is either sent to the poison-message queue, or a negative acknowledgement is sent back to the sender. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 。For more information, see and .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan RetryCycleDelay { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示尝试传递无法立即传递的消息时，各个重试周期之间的时间延迟。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the time delay between retry cycles when attempting to deliver a message that cannot be delivered immediately.

value.span: 一个 ，指定在开始下一个尝试传递到接收应用程序的周期前等待的时间间隔。

span.span: The that specifies the interval of time to wait before starting the next cycle of delivery attempts to the receiving application.

value.span: 默认值为 10 分钟。

span.span: The default value is 10 minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单个重试周期尝试按指定次数向接收应用程序传递消息。A single retry cycle attempts to deliver a message to a receiving application a specified number of times. 尝试次数由 属性指定。The number of attempts made is specified by the property. 如果在连续重试了指定次数后，应用程序仍未能访问消息，则将消息发送到重试队列。If the application fails to access the message after the specified number of immediate retries, the message is sent to a retry queue. 后续的重试周期包括在经过由 指定的延迟后，从重试队列返回应用程序队列以再次尝试传递给接收应用程序的消息。Subsequent retry cycles consist of the message being returned from the retry queue to the application queue to attempt delivery to the application again, after a delay specified by the . 重试周期数由 指定。The number of retry cycles is specified by .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Scheme As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Scheme { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Returns the scheme for this binding.

value.span: 此绑定的方案。

span.span: The scheme for this binding.

value.span: 返回的方案取决于 的实现。

span.span: The scheme returned depends on the implementation of .

value.span: 实现返回“net.msmq”。

span.span: The implementation returns "net.msmq".

value.span: 实现返回“msmq.formatname”。

span.span: The implementation returns "msmq.formatname".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列 (MSMQ) 支持使用本机 MSMQ 协议和 SRMP 协议在队列管理器之间传输消息。Message Queuing (MSMQ) supports transporting messages between queue managers using both the native MSMQ protocol and the SRMP protocol. 使用队列传输绑定的应用程序可以同时使用这两种协议。Applications that use the queued transport binding can use both of these protocols. 队列传输绑定所支持的协议方案为：net.msmq（本地协议）、net.srmp（SRMP 协议）和 net.srmps（基于 HTTPS 的 SRMP）。The protocol schemes supported by the queued transport binding are net.msmq for the native protocol, net.srmp for the SRMP protocol, and net.srmps for SRMP over HTTPS. 支持单一方案 msmq.formatname，用户可以使用该方案直接在队列地址中指定队列的格式名称。The supports a single scheme, msmq.formatname, with which the user can specify the format name of the queue directly in the queue address.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property ReceiveSynchronously As Boolean Implements IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示传入请求是由同步处理更加有效还是异步处理更加有效。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether incoming requests can be handled more efficiently synchronously or asynchronously.

value.span: 如果可以更有效地同步进行; 处理请求否则为。

span.span: if requests can be handled more efficiently synchronously; otherwise .

value.span: 默认值为 ，即异步处理请求。

span.span: The default is , to handle requests asynchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 为 `true` 时， 属性将设置为 `true`。The property is set to `true` when the is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan TimeToLive { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个时间间隔，该时间间隔指示此绑定处理的消息在过期之前可以保留在队列中的时间长度。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval of time that indicates how long the messages processed by this binding can be in the queue before they expire.

value.span: ，指示消息在过期之前可以保留在队列中的时间长度。

span.span: The that indicates how long the messages can be in the queue before they expire.

value.span: 默认值为 1 天。

span.span: The default value is 1 day.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置 属性可以确保具有时效性的消息不会在由接收应用程序进行处理之前过时。The property is set to ensure that time-sensitive messages do not become stale before they are processed by the receiving applications. 如果队列中的消息在指定时间间隔内未被接收应用程序访问，则该消息为过时消息。A message in a queue that is not accessed by the receiving application within the time interval specified is expired. 过期消息将发送到一个称为死信队列的特殊队列中。Expired messages are sent to a special queue called the dead-letter queue. 死信队列的位置通过 属性进行设置，或基于保证设置为适当的默认值。The location of the dead-letter queue is set with the property or to the appropriate default, based on assurances.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseMsmqTracing { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应跟踪由此绑定处理的消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether messages processed by this binding should be traced.

value.span: 如果应跟踪由此绑定处理的消息，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if messages processed by this binding should be traced; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果启用了跟踪，则每当消息离开或到达消息队列 (MSMQ) 计算机时，都会创建报告消息并将其发送到报告队列。When tracing is enabled, report messages are created and sent to the report queue each time the message leaves or arrives at a Message Queuing (MSMQ) computer.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseSourceJournal { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应将此绑定处理的消息副本存储到源日记队列中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether copies of messages processed by this binding should be stored in the source journal queue.

value.span: 如果应将此绑定处理的消息副本存储在源日记队列中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if copies of messages processed by this binding should be stored in the source journal queue; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果排队应用程序保留已离开计算机传出队列的消息的记录，则可以将这些消息复制到日记队列。Queued applications that keep a record of messages that have left the computer's outgoing queue can copy the messages to a journal queue. 在消息离开传出队列，并且接收到目标计算机已接收该消息的确认后，该消息的副本就会保留在发送计算机的系统日志队列中。Once a message leaves the outgoing queue and an acknowledgment is received that the message was received on the destination computer, a copy of the message is kept in the sending computer's system journal queue.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ValidityDuration { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定由接收上下文功能锁定消息的持续时间。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the duration a message will be locked by the receive context feature.

value.span: 一个 timespan 对象。

span.span: A timespan object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 当 对某一消息过期时，如果过期是在事务处理期间发生的，则会随工作流实例一起中止用于其处理的任何事务。If expires for a message, any transaction that may be used for its processing will be aborted along with the workflow instance if the expiration occurs during the transaction.
